page.content:
BatchGeocoder

Use this tool to take a spreadsheet (.xls) with addresses and display records on our maps. To work, the file must be 97 - 2003 MS Excel format and have an address field, city field, and zip codes. For files over 200 records, results can take some time.

--------->Upload your excel file; specify which columns contain the address fields. Once the addresses are loaded, you can export the file back to excel with the latitude coordinates or export to googles geographic format.

--------->Download your data back to excel with geographic information tacked on.

--------->Download your data back to a .kml file, a geographic file that opens in google earth and other programs.

* Uploaded files must be in 97 - 2003 .xls format and contain at least an address, city, and zip code field.
